doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Jahangir Hossain Bhuiyan
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Jahangir Hossain Bhuiyan is a Cancer Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DMRT (Dhaka), TTRT (China). He is a Director, Professor & Head, Radiotherapy & Cancer at Mainamoti Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at CD Path & Hospital Pvt. Ltd.. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Jahangir Hossain Bhuiyan at CD Path & Hospital Pvt. Ltd. is 5pm to 9pm (San to Thu) & 10am to 12pm (Fri).

chamber.address: Shishu Monagal Road, Badurtoal, Cumilla â€“ 3500

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Rofiuddin
doctor.degree: MBBS, MPhil (BSMMU), IAEA Fellowship Training (South Korea)
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Rofiuddin is a Cancer Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, MPhil (BSMMU), IAEA Fellowship Training (South Korea). He is a Professor, Radiotherapy & Oncology at International Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital). Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Rofiuddin at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital) is 10am to 5pm (Only Friday).
